publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6844Marilyn Livingstone:Kirkcaldy Referees Make the Gradeâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Scott Lambie, Ruaridh Kilgour, Daniel Stevenson and Jordan Stokoe, all from Kirkcaldy, for being promoted to the list of referees eligible to officiate in senior football in Scotland; understands that will initially start refereeing at a semi-professional level in the junior ranks but will have the opportunity to progress to the Scottish Football League, Scottish Premier League and beyond if they continue to demonstrate the ability, enthusiasm and fitness that has helped them to reach this stage; commends Fife Referees and the Kirkcaldy Area Sports Council for identifying and developing local talent in sports, and believes that these referees are an excellent example to all young people interested in sports in Kirkcaldy and the surrounding areas. Supported by: James Kelly*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*, David Stewart*, Sarah Boyack*, Ken Macintosh*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-6844 Kirkcaldy Referees Make the Grade (lodged on 19 August 2010) Karen Whitefield*, John Park*, George Foulkes*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-6844 Kirkcaldy Referees Make the Grade (lodged on 19 August 2010) Helen Eadie*
